ComicInfo.Summary:
AXIS Aftermath!
The smoke has cleared, and the AXIS Event is Over! The Inversion has been reversed and all is (almost) right with the world!
Now that Apocalypse has reverted back to Evan, it's time to pick-up the pieces and go home. And by pieces, we mean Deadpool's disembodied head!
Can they find Wade's body before it grows a new head? Can they make it out of Manhattan alive? Will Shiklah ever forgive her husband for becoming Zen-Pool? And what about the Faux-Men?
Stop asking questions and READ the BOOK!
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-10 10:23:48. [CVDB474626]
